name: book-publishing-template-improved
description: Improved Book Publishing Template with Easy Setup
author: Book Publishing Template Contributors

scripts.preview: npm run build && npx http-server public -p 8080 --silent
scripts.test:light: npm run lint:light && npm run build
scripts.build:validate: npm run build && npm run check-links
scripts.help:
echo 'Available commands:
  npm run setup - Interactive setup
  npm run build - Build the book
  npm run build:safe - Build with conflict detection
  npm run build:validate - Build and check links
  npm run check-conflicts - Check Jekyll conflicts
  npm run fix-conflicts - Auto-fix Jekyll conflicts
  npm run check-links - Validate internal links
  npm run setup:hooks - Install pre-commit hooks
  npm run validate:config - Validate configuration files
  npm run preview - Local preview
  npm run configure:workflows - Disable problematic workflows
  npm run deploy - Deploy to GitHub Pages'
